p: Japanese encephalitis virus most commonly circulates amongst birds and mosquitoes. 30 Pigs are referred to as a virus-amplifying host because they develop high viremia. 31 As for EEE virus and WEE virus, horses and humans are dead-end hosts for JEV. 32 The virus is endemic in southern areas of Asia and some Pacific countries, such as Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, New Guinea and Australia where sporadic outbreaks are observed. 33 Whereas in northern Asiatic areas such as Korea, Nepal, China, Taiwan, Japan, northern parts of Vietnam, India or Thailand; seasonal epidemics develop. 33 In Korea, around half of 989 horses tested between 2005 and 2007 were antibody positive. 34 In India, 10.5% of 637 horses screened between 2006 and 2010 had antibodies against JEV. 35
